location: Three lanes outbound and one lane inbound from 7 p.m. to 9 p.m. for post-game traffic.
Alumni Dr is one way from the stadium to Nicholasville Rd.
Cooper Dr is one way from the stadium to Tates Creek Rd.
Waller Ave is one way from RR tracks to Harrodsburg Rd.

incidentType: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
location: All traffic from the stadium must turn right on Tates Creek.

incidentType: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
location: All outbound Tates Creek traffic from Cooper Dr area must turn left on Alumni.
